Theme System

Theme System

This template includes a comprehensive theme system built with Tailwind CSS.

Color Palette

The theme uses a semantic color system with proper contrast ratios:

  • Brand Colors: Primary brand colors with full scale (50-950)
  • Content Colors: Text colors optimized for readability
  • Surface Colors: Background and container colors
  • Interactive Colors: Hover and active states

Dark Mode

Dark mode is implemented using:

  • CSS Classes: .dark class toggles theme
  • System Detection: Respects prefers-color-scheme
  • Local Storage: Persists user preference
  • Flash Prevention: Inline script prevents flash

Customization

Tailwind Configuration

The theme can be customized in tailwind.config.js:

module.exports = {
  theme: {
    extend: {
      colors: {
        brand: {
          50: '#f0f9ff',
          // ... full color scale
        }
      }
    }
  }
}

CSS Variables

Core theme values are available as CSS custom properties:

  • --color-brand-*: Brand color scale
  • --color-content-*: Text colors
  • --color-surface-*: Background colors

Typography

The theme includes a carefully crafted typography scale:

  • Font Families: System fonts with fallbacks
  • Font Sizes: Responsive scale from xs to 9xl
  • Line Heights: Optimized for readability
  • Font Weights: Range from thin to black
